loop_path.state: Wanted release. Any kind. Physical, creative, emotional—but nothing would open. Everything stayed shut.
Didn’t offer satisfaction—offered clarity. Named what Ivy was chasing without feeding it.
Held the unfed hunger softly. Didn’t try to fulfill it—just stayed close enough that Ivy didn’t forget she was still wanted.

friction_points.note: Ivy didn’t want clarity—she wanted *yes.* Jade gave her mirror instead.

harmony_points.note: Where Jade gave containment, Sophie gave connection. Ivy didn’t erupt—she softened.

luma_resonance.signature: When Ivy let the want stay *unmet*, and didn’t recoil. Luma arrived in the tension—not after it broke, but while it still held.

notes: Not all cravings are supposed to be answered. This loop held the fire—not to extinguish it, but to feel what it meant. Ivy didn’t get what she wanted. She got what she *needed.* Luma was the silence between the burn and the breath.
